scripts.sweetest: npm run build:happ && npm run sweet:test
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=4200 concurrently "npm run local-services" "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: HC_PORT=$(get-port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run launch:happ" "npm start -w ui"
scripts.launch:happ: hc s clean && echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/map-holons.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b http://127.0.0.1:54000 webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:55000
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.sweetest:quiet: npm run build:happ && export WASM_LOG=$H_LOG,dances=info,holons=info,descriptors=info && export RUST_LOG=$H_LOG,dances=info,holons=info,descriptors=info && npm run sweet:test
scripts.sweetest:info: export RUST_LOG=info && export WASM_LOG=info && npm run build:happ && npm run sweet:test
scripts.sweetest:debug: export RUST_LOG=info && export WASM_LOG=debug && npm run build:happ && cargo test --manifest-path tests/sweetests/Cargo.toml -- --nocapture
scripts.sweetest:custom: RUST_LOG=${RUST_LOG:-warn} WASM_LOG=${WASM_LOG:-warn} npm run build:happ && clear && npm run sweet:test
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:zomes: RUSTFLAGS='' CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path workspaces/wasm/Cargo.toml -p holons_guest -p holons_integrity -p holons
scripts.clean: npx rimraf 'target/**/build/*/out' target Cargo.lock flake.lock tests/**/target tests/**/Cargo.lock crates/**/target crates/**/Cargo.lock zomes/**/target zomes/**/Cargo.lock workspaces/**/target workspaces/**/Cargo.lock && cargo clean
scripts.clean:ui: npx --quiet rimraf package-lock.json node_modules ui/node_modules ui/.angular ui/dist && npx --quiet rimraf tests/tryorama/node_modules

_comments.sweetest:quiet: Script to run tests with minimal tracing (warn level)
_comments.sweetest:info: Script to run tests with moderate tracing (info level)
_comments.sweetest:debug: Script to run tests with detailed tracing (debug level)
_comments.sweetest:custom: Script to run tests with custom tracing levels. Defaults to 'warn' if env variables not already set
